nodes.text: The Rakton campaign was a military campaign conducted by the Republic Special Forces Division during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire that targeted General Arkos Rakton. After the Battle of the Gauntlet, Rakton attacked the Republic in force, and Havoc Squad carried out a number of missions to foil Rakton's plans before defeating him at the Bastion during the Battle of Corellia.
